StatusIcon.tooltip: Declares a status icon for the perk whenever the player or monster possesses it. The provided file path to your image will be displayed as an icon in the status bar

TurnDuration.tooltip: Removes the perk from the wielder once the set duration has depleted to 0. Ticks down for every step or combat turn.

TimeDuration.tooltip: Removes the perk from the wielder once the set duration has depleted to 0. Ticks down for every time jump (e.g. Morning -> Noon), note sleeping till morning will take a variable number of ticks depending on the current time. 6 would be a full day

RemovedOnOrgasm.tooltip: Perk is removed when the wielder orgasms. Set a value of 0, as EffectPower: is not needed

EndMessage.tooltip: Displays the given text via its correlating EffectPower string when the perk ends via TurnDuration or TimeDuration. This can use Text Markup, and thus in extension, Functions

NonPersistentEffect.tooltip: Declare the perk as a NonPersistentEffect, removing it whenever a Non-Persistent Status Effect (e.g. Charm) would be removed by the game Set a value of 0, as EffectPower: is not needed

RemovableEffect.tooltip: Declare the perk as a RemovableEffect , that allows the effect to be cleared on use of a pancea(currently just this), or on combat end like NonPersistentEffect. EffectPower: is not needed

RemovedOnOrgasm.tooltip: Perk is removed when the wielder orgasms. Set a value of 0, as EffectPower: is not needed

EroBoost.tooltip: Alters eros found by a percent. If wielded by a monster, alters their own eros dropped.

ItemDropChance.tooltip: Alters item drop chance from monsters by a percent. If wielded by a monster, alters their own item drop chance

TreasureFindChance.tooltip: Alters percent chance of finding treasure during exploration, and by extension, higher chance of rare treasure

BetterPrices.tooltip: Alter all shop prices by a percent, for both selling and buying. Positive values lower purchase cost and increases sale price, negative values increase cost and lowers sale price

BuyPrices.tooltip: Alter all shop prices by a percent, for both selling and buying

SellPrices.tooltip: Alter all shop prices by a percent, for both selling and buying

ExpBoost.tooltip: Alter all exp gains by a percent. If wielded by a monster, alters their own exp drop amount.

LossExp.tooltip: Alter exp gains from monster exp on loss by a percent.

DamageBoost.tooltip: Alters all types of damage dealt by a percent

MagicBoost.tooltip: Alters magic damage dealt by a percent

NonPenMagicBoost.tooltip: Alters non-penetrative (e.g. fire dildo, pole beam, ethereal hands) magic damage dealt by a percent.

BreastBoost.tooltip: Alters breast/nipple damage by a percent.

SeductionBoost.tooltip: Alters seduction damage dealt by a percent.

KissBoost.tooltip: Alters kiss damage dealt by a percent.

SexBoost.tooltip: Alters sex damage dealt by a percent.

NonPenSexBoost.tooltip: Alters non-penetrative sex (e.g. dildo, fingering, stroking, etc.) damage dealt by a percent.

AssBoost.tooltip: Alters ass damage dealt by a percent.

NonPenAssBoost.tooltip: Alters non-penetrative ass (e.g. dildo, fingering, etc.) damage dealt by a percent.

PainBoost.tooltip: Alters pain damage dealt by a percent.

PenetrationBoost.tooltip: Alters penetration damage dealt by a percent.

OralBoost.tooltip: Alters oral damage dealt by a percent.

ForeplayBoost.tooltip: Alters foreplay damage dealt by a percent.

SexToyBoost.tooltip: Alter sex toy damage by a percent

BaselineAllureFlatBuff.tooltip: Alter Allure’s natural flat damage buff scaling to everything by a flat amount.

BaselineAllureFlatPercentBoost.tooltip: Alters Allure’s natural flat damage buff scaling to everything by a percent.

ForeplayFlatDamage.tooltip: Alters foreplay damage dealt by a flat amount.

CritChanceBoost.tooltip: Alters chance for the wielder’s skills to crit by a flat amount.

CritDamageBoost.tooltip: Alters critical damage dealt by a percent amount on top of the original calculation.

RecoilBoost.tooltip: Alters overall recoil damage dealt to opponents.

AllureRecoilBoost.tooltip: Alters the percent of allure based recoil damage dealt to opponents.

DamageReduction.tooltip: Alters all damage taken by a percent, take caution.

ForeplayEnergyRegen.tooltip: Alters energy regeneration through foreplay skills by a percent of the wielders max.

ForeplayArousalRegen.tooltip: Alters arousal regeneration through foreplay skills by a percent of the wielders max.

RegenMaxArousal.tooltip: Restores a percent of the max arousal of the wielder.

RegenMaxEnergy.tooltip: Restores a percent of the max arousal of the wielder

VirilityBoost.tooltip: Alters the players Virility by a percent. Player only.

RecoilDamageTaken.tooltip: Alters recoil damage taken by a percent.

CritDamageBoostSelf.tooltip: Alters critical damage the wielder receives prior to the final calculation.

Edging.tooltip: Experimental perk type that gives percent chance to resist orgasm, stacks with other sources.

MultiplySpirit Loss.tooltip: Multiply the spirit lost by the given number

StatusEffectDuration.tooltip: Alters the duration of the users status effects

StatusChanceBoost.tooltip: Alter status effect application chances from skills.

StartDeeperInTrance.tooltip: Player starts this many steps deeper in trance when hit with a trance related move. Anything below 1-10 will trigger instant trance.

CantBreakFreeOfTranceWithoutItems.tooltip: Can no longer automatically start to break free of trance after 3 consecutive turns without getting stunned

TranceStunChance.tooltip: Alters the chance for the player to be stunned each turn while fully tranced by a percent.

ForeplayDefDown.tooltip: Applies a status effect that reduces the defense to the enemy targeted with a foreplay skill for 3 turns

StunDelay.tooltip: Alters the delay between stun status effects

SleepAmp.tooltip: Alters the flat amount of energy lost per turn upon being afflicted by Sleep

ParalysisAmp.tooltip: Alters the chance to be stunned by paralysis.

AphrodisiacAmp.tooltip: Alters the damage taken from aphrodisiacs by a percent.

AphrodisiacTurnCure.tooltip: Removes set amount from aphrodisiac potency every turn

DisableRun.tooltip: Can disable the players ability to run from all fights.

GetOutOfStance.tooltip: Alters chance to get out of stance by a percent.

OutOfStanceEvade.tooltip: Alters evade chance when out of stances by a percent.

RemoveRestraints.tooltip: Alters restraint escape chance by a percent.

RestraintBoost.tooltip: Increases the effectiveness of your own restraints.

StanceBoost.tooltip: Increases the effectiveness of your own stances.

RunChance.tooltip: Alters run chance by a percent.

Unbounded.tooltip: If your action is interrupted by a restraint, you will struggle instead of doing nothing by default

Unshackled.tooltip: If you break a restraint with struggle, you get to act immediately.

OrgasmEnergyDrain.tooltip: Drains flat amount of energy upon the target orgasming. Has no stance restrictions.

StanceStuck.tooltip: Alters chance of stance escape by a percent.

InitiativeBonus.tooltip: Flatly alters perk type owners initiative, influencing turn order

MinStatCheckDie.tooltip: Flatly alters the minimum dice your d20 can roll in a stat check

RestSpiritRestored.tooltip: Recovers flat amount of spirit when resting at rest points

RestEnergyRestored.tooltip: Recovers percent amount of max energy when resting at rest points

RestArousalRestored.tooltip: Recovers percent amount of max arousal when resting at rest points

GiveSensitivityPoints.tooltip: Give player points to reduce sensitivity. Only works if acquired at level up.

GainSpirit.tooltip: Give the the player spirit. Only works if acquired at level up.

ResistFinalOrgasm.tooltip: Gives a luck chance plus a base amount to resist their last orgasm.

SemenEnergyDrain.tooltip: Player loses given amount of energy on orgasm with monster if in sex, anal, blowjob, tailfuck, or titfuck stance.

SemenHeal.tooltip: Monster recovers given amount of arousal on player orgasm if in sex, anal, blowjob, tailfuck, or titfuck stance.

SemenAttackBoost.tooltip: Percent damage alteration if player orgasms in sex, anal, blowjob, tailfuck, or titfuck stance.

KissingAdverse.tooltip: tell the monster to try to get out of the related stance even if they have a skill for it

AnalAdverse.tooltip: tell the monster to try to get out of the related stance even if they have a skill for it

SexAdverse.tooltip: tell the monster to try to get out of the related stance even if they have a skill for it

NoAnus.tooltip: make it impossible for the player to initiate or attack the given stances, excluding grope attacks on chests

NoChest.tooltip: make it impossible for the player to initiate or attack the given stances, excluding grope attacks on chests

NoMouth.tooltip: make it impossible for the player to initiate or attack the given stances, excluding grope attacks on chests

NoPussy.tooltip: make it impossible for the player to initiate or attack the given stances, excluding grope attacks on chests

MonstrousBoost.tooltip: Damage boosts by a percent for the related fetish.

FeetUseBoost.tooltip: Damage boosts by a percent for the related fetish.

BreastUseBoost.tooltip: Damage boosts by a percent for the related fetish.

AssUseBoost.tooltip: Damage boosts by a percent for the related fetish.
